metadata.title: CVE-2022-0123 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered affecting GitLab versions prior to 14.4.5,between 14.5.0 and 14.5.3, and between 14.6.0 and 14.6.1. GitLab does notvalidate SSL certificates for some of external CI services which makes itpossible to perform MitM attacks on connections to these external services.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
